amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: University of Nebraska-Lincoln; doctoral and postdoctoral programs; primary responsibility; exception.
amendatorysection.para: The University of Nebraska-Lincoln shall continue to be the primary unit within the University of Nebraska for doctoral and postdoctoral programs except in health-related disciplines. There shall be no duplication of administrative responsibility for any doctoral or postdoctoral program among units of the university.
